thread.title: A European Mall Venture Aims to Create the Antidote to Online Shopping

author: Peter Grant
title: A European Mall Venture Aims to Create the Antidote to Online Shopping
text:
A venture of a Dutch pension-fund service provider and a European retail developer is planning to invest â‚¬550 million ($678 million) in new shopping locations in a bet that well-crafted bricks-and-mortar retail will thrive amid the online onslaught.
PGGM and Redevco, both headquartered in the Amsterdam area, plan to build a portfolio of five to eight European shopping destinations with the right mix of brands, food and entertainment to survive in a digital age.
